snippet.title: Aldoria Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Aldoria

Explore your way through the dangerous fantasy land of Aldoria where a single hit will kill you! Slay monsters and collect magical abilities in this small skill-testing metroidvania.

Now available on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3146930/Aldoria/
